Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{3: 'How did the operation go?'}
{3: 'Lamia cannot remember.'}
{3: 'All she knew was the medical department was swamped with people. Even Lustrous, who she had not seen for a long time, was there.'}
{3: 'She glances at Lamia on the operating table with an apathetic face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'Did she ask for this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Director', 3: 'She requested it.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lustrous nods and leaves the room without looking back.'}
{3: 'The medical director then looks at Lamia.'}
{2: 'Medical Director', 3: "I'm about to operate on you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Medical Director', 3: "A word of reminder. The pain will be insufferable. There's no way to go back once you've started.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia finds herself on a clean hospital bed when she wakes up.'}
{3: 'Her arms have become metal. The black shell and red joints glow under the pale white light.'}
{3: 'There is a large black plate on her head that looks like the head of a hammerhead shark, made from the same metal used in her arms.'}
{3: 'She cannot see the lower half of her body as it is covered under a blanket. But based on the metal parts on her waist, they are probably also replaced by machines.'}
{3: "Her brain gradually starts to recover from anesthesia, as if it has finally accepted the reality and realized it's not a dream."}
{3: 'Lamia feels lost. She forgot how she ended up here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Medical Director', 3: 'Could it be a post-surgery complication?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The medical director mumbles to himself.'}
{2: 'Medical Director', 3: "Hmm, there are some minor problems, but it's a success nonetheless. Can't ask for much more from the first trial.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lamia moves her "limbs."'}
{3: 'She struggles to walk as she is still not used to the extra "parts" on her body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Medical Director', 3: 'Stop dawdling. Come here, we have to make you adapt to your body right away.', 4: '1'}
